00070 class DebitData {
00071 public:
00072    DebitData( uint32 idate, uint32 iUIN, const MC2String& iserverID,
00073               const MC2String& iuserOrigin, uint32 imessageID,
00074               uint32 idebInfo, uint32 ioperationType, uint32 isentSize,
00075               const MC2String& ioperationDescription ) 
00076          : date( idate ), UIN( iUIN ), serverID( iserverID ),
00077            userOrigin( iuserOrigin ), messageID( imessageID ),
00078            debInfo( idebInfo ), operationType( ioperationType ),
00079            sentSize( isentSize ), 
00080            operationDescription( ioperationDescription )
00081       {}
00082 
00083    bool operator < ( const DebitData& o ) const {
00084       return date < o.date;
00085    }
00086 
00087    friend ostream& operator << ( ostream& o, const DebitData& d ) {
00088       o << "DebitData( " << d.date << ", " << d.UIN << ", " << d.serverID
00089         << ", " << d.userOrigin << ", " << d.messageID << ", " << d.debInfo
00090         << ", " << d.operationType << ", " << d.sentSize << ", " 
00091         << d.operationDescription << " )";
00092       return o;
00093    }
00094 
00095    uint32 date;
00096    uint32 UIN;
00097    MC2String serverID;
00098    MC2String userOrigin;
00099    uint32 messageID;
00100    uint32 debInfo;
00101    uint32 operationType;
00102    uint32 sentSize;
00103    MC2String operationDescription;
00104 };
